WorkItem.Description:
The following engineering enchants have changed in value for 3.2 from the values in the Rawr data files for 2.2.11:
Springy Arachnoweave (cloak) - Now 27 spellpower (vs old value of 18)
Hyperspeed Accelerators (gloves) - Now 340 haste rating for 12s/1m (vs old duration of 10s/1m)
Nitro Boosts (boots) - Now 24 crit rating (vs old value of 16)
 
These are what I noticed for the Mage module. Additionally, the Flexweave Underlay cloak enchant that may be present for melee modules is now 23 Agility instead of a somewhat lower amount pre-3.2.
 
Looks like the Lightweave Embroidery tailoring enchant to cloak is also unchanged. It is now 295 spellpower instead of 250 (same duration/ICD).
WorkItem.Summary: Engineering/Tailoring Enchant Values Not Updated to 3.2 in Rawr 2.2.11

Comments.Message: An additional comment: I tried to fix these values myself by editing EnchantCache.xml but despite editing and saving that file without Rawr running, the next time I open Rawr, it recreates a new cache with all default values again, reverting back to the incorrect values. Am I missing something to get changes to "stick" as a workaround until the next release that corrects these?
Yes, there's a property on the enchants there, I think named IsCustom (may have that wrong, not in front of me right now), set that to true.
